books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady shares personal stories and the tools she uses to deal with difficult situations.
books.name: THE LIGHT WE CARRY

books.author: by Matthew Perry
books.description: The actor, known for playing Chandler Bing on “Friends,” shares stories from his childhood and his struggles with sobriety.
books.name: FRIENDS, LOVERS, AND THE BIG TERRIBLE THING

books.author: by Jennette McCurdy
books.description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother.
books.name: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED

books.author: by Mike Pence
books.description: The former vice president gives an account of his career, including his time in the Oval Office and during the Jan. 6 insurrection.
books.name: SO HELP ME GOD

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Bono
books.description: The lead singer of the Irish rock band U2 offers details of his life, career and activism.
books.name: SURRENDER

books.author: by Jerry Seinfeld
books.description: Behind-the-scenes photos and stories of the streaming series about the art of comedy.
books.name: THE COMEDIANS IN CARS GETTING COFFEE BOOK

books.author: by Jon Meacham
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning biographer portrays the life of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: AND THERE WAS LIGHT

books.author: by Siddhartha Mukherjee
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning author chronicles the discovery of cells and describes how modern medicine uses them.
books.name: THE SONG OF THE CELL

books.author: by Stacy Schiff
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning biographer details Samuel Adams’s contributions to the American Revolution.
books.name: THE REVOLUTIONARY

books.author: by Quentin Tarantino
books.description: The filmmaker shares his love of cinema with special attention given to key American films of the 1970s.
books.name: CINEMA SPECULATION

books.author: by Andrew Morton
books.description: A biography of Queen Elizabeth II, which explores her influence on Britain and the rest of the world.
books.name: THE QUEEN

books.author: by Benjamin Netanyahu
books.description: An autobiography by the former prime minister of Israel.
books.name: BIBI

books.author: by Bob Dylan
books.description: In a collection of more than 60 essays, the musician and winner of the Nobel Prize in Literature explores the nature of popular music.
books.name: THE PHILOSOPHY OF MODERN SONG

books.author: by Randall Munroe
books.description: The creator of the web comic “xkcd” and former NASA roboticist looks into hypothetical and oddball scenarios.
books.name: WHAT IF? 2
